Name: PuzzlePet - Feed your cat
About the game: Kittens love to play and walk everywhere until they get tired, then it's time to sleep or eat. In this game, solve puzzles by managing food and feeding the kittens scattered across the stage. Simple controls to play. Feed your cat. Make the kitten happy today. Functionalities: Click to move, collect and feed the kittens. Minimalist graphics; 50 levels; Relaxing music Feed a cute kitten today!
